isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Mirrors - Heated & Lighted

svcproc.title: Mirrors - Heated & Lighted
svcproc.para: Refer to Accessory Power on page 4 for description of accessory power circuits to A3 Accessory Adapter (501). Refer to MIRROR LIGHTS AND HEATED MIRRORS circuit diagram in CTS-5119S for the following discussion.

Heated Mirror -The heated mirror switch (438) receives power from A3 Accessory Adapter (501) through 10A fuse F5-A with the key in the or position. With the switch ON, power is applied to the heater element in the mirrors. Note that the mirror switch includes two LEDs.
The LED that receives power from terminal 6 with the mirror switch ON is illuminated to indicate that the mirror heaters are ON. The LED between terminals 7 and 8 is used to illuminate the switch.

Mirror Lights -Power to the mirror lights is controlled by the Cab and Trailer Light Switch(466). Refer to LIGHT SYSTEMS for that system. Power from Cab and Trailer Light Switch (466) is applied to 15A fuse F8-C, which supplies power to operate the mirror lights.
